overview: "The Great Dominatrix" parodies anti-Semitic propaganda in an absurdist attempt to counteract today's rampant xenophobia. Inspired by Charlie Chaplin's "The Great Dictator "(1940) and the Jewish myth of the artificial intelligence, the character of "My Golem" transforms into a Hasidic dominatrix to dominate an inflatable globe.
title: The Great Dominatrix
